thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: A SMALL TREASURE

title: A SMALL TREASURE
text:
(91192) 2015-10-12 13:37 
Ola Jorge, nice the close up view of the colourful insect with the quality of the scene to be superb.Excellent the light and the colour management of the scene. Regards,Danos lousat (83642) 2015-10-12 14:35 
Hi Jorge,a perfect pic for treknature too and a great gift to an insects fan like me! An excellent macro of this specie,isn't a bug but a cicada,its name is "Carineta diardi" and it seems very famous in South America but not easy to find.Very good quality of sharpness and bright colors despite the difficult light,very useful post! Have a nice evening and thanks,Luciano Photo Information
